about_the_game:
The revenge of the betrayed king in desperate times, fight and conquer to reclaim your royal glory!

Even if all your troops have defected, As the king, you have to fight for your kingdom with all your might. Move carefully, load your gun, aim at the enemy king and shoot without fail. Be careful fending off enemy attacks and avoiding bloodshed, but don't let them stop you from reclaiming your kingdom. With your smart strategies, you will fight your way through all levels and proudly take back what is rightfully yours with supreme glory.




Always remember, your honorary mission is to gun down the enemy king, who is under layers of careful protection by his pawns, at all cost. Pick up your scattergun, break through brambles and thorns and seize every chance to aim at your goal!





- Turn-based strategy & first-person shooter
- Immersive Sci-Fi battlefield
- FPS strategy game in combine with Chess gameplay
- Smooth shooting with stunning blast effects
- Detailed beginners guide friendly to new players
